function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Hoarding of vaccines","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of capacity for local vaccine production","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of business continuity plans leading to vulnerability and reduction in labor market participation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differential impact across industries and sectors due to lockdown enforcement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capacity and resilience gaps across the economy","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of organization and coordination leading to the lack of widespread testing and underreporting of cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of non-biodegradable personal protective gears leading to environmental pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in vaccination distribution and administration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in risk communication across states leading to different risk perceptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps in local production capacity and resilience across industries","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in urban food systems and value chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public education campaigns leading to the spread of disinformation and misinformation about diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation driven majorly by social media, lack of trust in leadership, and sensationalization of inaccurate news.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Information gap and digital divide hindering access to reliable information about disease outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of food and waterborne disease due to climate change.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of socio-economic stress due to climate change.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to accurate information leading to the spread of misinformation and acceptance of falsehoods.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased pest populations and impact on agricultural productivity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy systems vulnerable to high temperatures and increased demand","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlation between temperature and interpersonal violence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper social safety net system leading to devastating impact during crises.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to curb climate change leading to chaos on a larger scale.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of climate change on insects and ecosystems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare infrastructure to cope with health emergencies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Societal and socio-economic gaps exacerbating the impact of health emergencies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of climate change and global warming on inducing disasters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change results in extended geographical range of disease vectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deforestation leads to cross-contact of pathogens through animal emigration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insect range expansion and phenological changes impact disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown source of infection in 41% of the cases within the first 30 days","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps capacity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global air travel and trade leading to ease of spread of communicable diseases like covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance and slow response to the arrival of the index case in resilience","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for future events","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased occurrence of typhoons, hurricanes, and extreme weather conditions leading to loss of lives, properties, and livelihoods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence of novel viruses, insects, and vector-borne diseases due to increase in temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ill-preparedness in managing rapid environmental risks induced by climate
